text: Some thought that the result would be all sorts of horrible illnesses brought on by the confined atmosphere."The shareholders who travel by it will be so heartily sick, what with the foul air, smoke and sulphur, that the mention of a railway will be worse than Ipecacuanha, wrote an anti-railway industrialist when it was proposed to build the Box Tunnel.
